attributes.action: Convicted pedophile have to stop receiving any all royalties, sponsorship payments and use the money to pay to support for vulnerable
attributes.additional_details: Convicted pedophiles should be treated the same as drug dealers and use a similar way they use the "proceeds of crime act" to remove all and any ill gained money, jewellery, phones computers (all wiped of course) houses cars and any thing that can be sold to get money for the victims. People of means (famous or wealthy) should lose every penny they have to pay for victim support instead of the state meeting the full cost. Famous people who receive royalties or sponsorship money should lose all entitlement at the moment of conviction!
